product-detail.descr: The Basic Tee 6-Pack allows you to fully express your vibrant personality with three grayscale options. Feeling adventurous?Put on a heather gray tee. Want to be a trendsetter? Try our exclusive colorway: 'Black'. Need to add an extra pop of color to your outfit? Our white tee has you covered.
